title: BingX Pre-Launch Futures Has Launched XPLUSDT
content: Dear Users, BingX Pre-Launch Futures has launched XPLUSDT. Get a head start by trading long or short with 5x leverage before its official listing. About the XPL Project: Plasma is a high-performance, scalable, and secure blockchain purpose-built for stablecoins. Built from the ground up, it delivers zero fees, lightning-fast transactions, and the robust security stablecoins like USD₮ require. Plasma combines a high-performance BFT consensus, full EVM compatibility, and secure state anchoring to Bitcoin—delivering the speed, scalability, and security stablecoins demand.
